snippet: The mission, to take place in Saudi Arabia, will include about 400 soldiers and hundreds of others to provide logistics, communications and other support.
abstract: Pentagon is planning to send several hundred soldiers and other personnel to Saudi Arabia to train Syrian rebels in fight against Islamic State; are seeking to build up ground force of Syrian opposition groups.
lead_paragraph: The mission, to take place in Saudi Arabia, will include about 400 soldiers and hundreds of others to provide logistics, communications and other support.

headline.main: Pentagon Will Send Troops to Train Some Syrian Rebels
headline.print_headline: Pentagon Will Send Trainers to Aid Some Syrian Rebels

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
